Package cs350s22.component.controller.dependency

Class ExpressionBinary

java.lang.Object
cs350s22.component.controller.dependency.A_Expression
cs350s22.component.controller.dependency.ExpressionBinary
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_XMLable
public class ExpressionBinary extends A_Expression
Defines the binary expression as expression operator expression. Evaluation is left-associative.
